overview: Pernille is pregnant and filled with joyful expectations to her new life as a mother. But when her son arrives, she is pressured to the limit by his crying voice and her problems with breastfeeding. She starts to doubt her abilities as a mother. She seeks support and comfort from her far more experienced group of mothers, whom tries to help Pernille in the best way they can. But how can one become a great mother?
title: Aqua Mamas
